text: Mundaun was a municipality of the district Surselva in the canton of Graubünden in Switzerland. On 1 January 2009, the former municipalities of Flond and Surcuolm merged into the new municipality of Mundaun. On 1 January 2016, the former municipalities of Mundaun and Obersaxen merged into the new municipality of Obersaxen Mundaun. ==Other websites== * Official website Category:2009 establishments in Switzerland Category:2016 disestablishments in Switzerland Category:Former municipalities of Graubünden
title: Mundaun
